- [Deals Updater](https://docs.irev.com/how-to-guides/deals-updater)
- [Payout/Revenue Creation and Tips](https://docs.irev.com/how-to-guides/payout-revenue-creation-and-tips)
- [Introduction](https://docs.irev.com/api/introduction)
- [Authentication](https://docs.irev.com/api/authentication)
- [How to create API tokens?](https://docs.irev.com/api/how-to-create-api-tokens)
- [Pagination and Order](https://docs.irev.com/api/pagination-and-order)
- [Affiliate API](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api)
- [Affiliate Profile](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/affiliate-profile): This page describes API endpoints for viewing and editing Affiliate Profile.
- [Offers](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/offers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing Offers.
- [Clicks](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/clicks): This page describes API endpoints for viewing Clicks.
- [Conversions](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/conversions): This page describes API endpoints for viewing all Conversions.
- [Affiliate Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/affiliate-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Affilaite Trackers.
- [Global Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/affiliate-trackers/global-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Global Trackers.
- [Default Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/affiliate-trackers/default-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Default Trackers.
- [Smart Links](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/smart-links): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Smart Links.
- [Groups](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/smart-links/groups)
- [Items](https://docs.irev.com/api/affiliate-api/smart-links/items)
- [User API](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api): The section includes the list of endpoints available for API users of the Partner Platform.
- [Clicks](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/clicks): This page describes API endpoints for viewing and creating Clicks.
- [Affiliates](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliates): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Affiliates.
- [Targeting](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliates/targeting): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Targeting rules for Affiliates.
- [Offer Access](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliates/offer-access): This page covers all API endpoints used to review, edit and create Access rules of a selected affiliate.
- [Offers](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/offers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Offers.
- [Targeting](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/offers/targeting): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Targeting rules for Offers.
- [Access](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/offers/access): This page describes API endpoints for viewing and editingAccess rules for Offers.
- [URLs](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/offers/urls): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating URLs for Offers.
- [Links](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/offers/links): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating links for tracking Clicks and Conversions of a specific Offer.
- [Goal Types](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/goal-types): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Goal Types.
- [Affiliate Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliate-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Affilaite Trackers.
- [Default Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliate-trackers/default-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Default Trackers.
- [Global Trackers](https://docs.irev.com/api/user-api/affiliate-trackers/global-trackers): This page describes API endpoints for viewing, editing, and creating Global Trackers.
